post_content:
Price reduction for the FLASH SALE only.  This listing valid for 24 hours only 



All prices include shipping costs. 
All prices assume payment by PP F&F
All Flash sale prices are firm.
Will discuss other forms of payment if necessary 
Purtell and Schlei have Polar Bear backs
Rockenfeld is the lone Southern League card.
Davidson did not win the Indianapolis 500
Pastorius did win more than a few games in Brooklyn
Schlei comes with his sweater
Sold! Please let me know your pay info!

Oops... I made a huge mistake! I thought it was the 6-pack for $180! (And was wondering why there werent 50 takers!)
... I got overexcited! Please accept my apologies for not reading the whole thing!

Lunker cut my fishing line and is no longer hooked and ate the bait.   The cards are still available.  Will you be the next lunker?  You needn’t purchase all six.  Nibblers are always welcomed. Even though I must rebait the cards, rebates are not offered on the sales.

Flash sale is now closed.  Remaining cards will be distributed free of charge on a week from some Tuesday.

I just haven't decided which Tuesday.
